title: Pointless Intermediary
text: Vendors that have selected this app to handle purchase transactions and tracking of shipments have done themselves a disservice. Recently, on two occasions I initiated transactions with vendors on their websites and the SHOP app inserted itself at checkout, intercepting the vendor‚Äôs order number and any tracking information. It took days for the transaction to move from a pending status on my credit card, and a few more days for the order to appear in the SHOP app‚Äôs order screen where it sat in an ‚Äúin transit‚Äù status for two weeks‚Äîafter which time the status was abruptly changed to ‚Äúcanceled‚Äù without explanation. The only upside was that I received a refund. The latest transaction started to follow the same pattern. After a few days I contacted the vendor‚Äôs website directly (the SHOP app attempted insert itself and redirect me to it‚Äôs app with ‚Äúwelcome back!‚Äù Messages and texting me a two-step authentication code ‚Äî highly annoying!), but I was finally able to log into the vendor‚Äôs site directly, setup an account, speak to a live customer service agent, and handle all transactions directly with the vendor. The SHOP app may be ok for finding products online, but it is an absolute ineffective nuisance beyond that. If it pops up during any future transactions, those vendors will probably lose my business‚Äîdealing with SHOP isn‚Äôt worth the aggravation.
